= id( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments match (or partially match) an item's !ArkInventory ID


== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N = string(s) to match

== Remarks ==
  * item id's are in the format `item:suffix:enchant:jewel1:jewel2:jewel3:jewel4`
  * partial matches can made
  * the item id can be found on the debug info menu

== Examples ==

`id( 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 )`

`id( 1, 23:34 )`

`id( 12:1:0:0:0:23, 54 )`
